Glucose.description: Plasma glucose concentration a 2 hours in an oral glucose tolerance test (mg/dL)

BMI.description: Body mass index (weight in kg/(height in m)^2)

DiabetesPedigreeFunction.description: Diabetes pedigree function (a function which scores likelihood of diabetes based on family history)

Outcome.description: Class variable (0 or 1) where 0 indicates that the patient does not have diabetes and 1 indicates that the patient has diabetes

value_dict.0: The patient does not have diabetes

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in medical diagnosis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the health features of the patient, please predict if the patient has diabetes.
prompt.answer_prompt: Does the patient have diabetes? Yes[1] or No[0]?

class_value_dict.0: The patient does not have diabetes

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in medical diagnosis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the health features of the patient, please predict the glucose level.
prompt.answer_prompt: What is the predicted glucose level?

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in medical diagnosis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the health features of the patient, please predict the Body Mass Index (BMI).

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in medical diagnosis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the health features of the patient, please predict the age.
